ReportSection.name: In-Person Assessment
ReportSection.ReportItem:
1. VISION

Enter snellen eye chart result
{$item}

2. HEARING

Difficulties in hearing detected?
{$item}

3. COMMUNICATION

Do you have trouble communicating your wishes to people?
{$item}

Do you have trouble finding words?
{$item}

Do you have trouble recalling names?
{$item}

5. DEMENTIA QUICK SCREEN

Word Recall:
How many words recalled?{$item}
Animal Naming within a Minute: How many animals?{$item}

6. DEPRESSION

Are you basically satisfied with your life?
{$item}

Do you often get bored?
{$item}

Do you often feel helpless?
{$item}

Do you prefer to stay at home rather than going out and doing new things?
{$item}

Do you feel pretty worthless the way you are now?
{$item}

7. BALANCE/FALLS/MOBILITY

Any concern regarding feelings of unsteadiness in times when standing?
{$item}

Any concern regarding feelings of unsteadiness in times when changes in direction if walking?
{$item}

If yes, consider checking BP and observe gait during TUG:
{$item}

Fall within the last 12 months?
{$item}

Sought medical attention after a fall?
{$item}

8. ADL

Do you have any difficulties or need reminding about everyday activities?
{$item}

ReportItem.options: Managing medications|Preparing meals|Using the phone|Housework|Laundry|Using transportation|Shopping|Managing finances/banking

ReportSection.ReportItem:
9. IADL

Do you have any difficulties or need reminding about everyday activities?
{$item}

10. CAREGIVER SUPPORT

Do you regularly receive assistance with everyday activities?
{$item}

11. URINARY INCONTINENCE

Do you have any problems with involuntary loss of water/urine?
{$item}
If yes, need for further assessment? {$item}

12. BOWEL

Do you get constipated?
{$item}
If yes, define what constipation means to you and how do you manage it? {$item}

Has there been a change in your regular bowel habit?
{$item}

Has there been any change in usual stool consistency?
{$item}
If yes, how has it changed? {$item}

13. MEDICATIONS

Do you take more than 5 prescribed drugs?
{$item}
Do you take more than 3 over the counter medications? {$item}

13. COMPLAINING OF FATIGUE

How often do you feel exhaustion or fatigue per week during normal activities?
{$item} / Week

Follow Eating Well with Canadaâ€™s Food Guide?
{$item}

17. OSTEOPOROSIS

How much Vitamin D do you take?
{$item}

How many servings of calcium do you get in a day?
{$item} servings/day

18. PAIN

Consider pain symptoms, non-specific presentation and/or presentation of pain behaviours.
Use pain scale (0 = No pain to 10 = most severe pain ever experienced)
{$item}

20. DENTAL

Do you brush your teeth and floss regularly? {$item}
Do you see a dentist yearly for regular cleaning? {$item}
Do your gums bleed while brushing your teeth? {$item}
ReportSection.Static:
<script type='text/javascript'>
                    $('span#avoid_dental4').hide();
                    function hideDentalCounsel(){
                        if($("input:radio[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_dental']:checked").val() == "No"){
                            $('span#avoid_dental4').show();
                        }
                        else if($("input:radio[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_dental2']:checked").val() == "No"){
                            $('span#avoid_dental4').show();
                        }
                        else if($("input:radio[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_dental3']:checked").val() == "No"){
                            $('span#avoid_dental4').show();
                        }
                        else{ $('span#avoid_dental4').hide();}
                    }
                    _.defer(hideDentalCounsel);
                    $("input:radio[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_dental']").change(hideDentalCounsel);
                    $("input:radio[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_dental2']").change(hideDentalCounsel);
                    $("input:radio[name='InPersonAssessment_avoid_dental3']").change(hideDentalCounsel);


                </script>
ReportSection.ReportItem:
21. LIFESTYLE ISSUES

Do you drink alcohol? {$item}
If yes, how much?{$item} # of drinks/week
Do you currently smoke or have you ever smoked? {$item}
Are you aware there are resources to support you? {$item}
how often / what type of activity? {$item}
